_xResult.title: Sultry She Said
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made long black sleeveless cocktail dress
_xResult.longdesc:
Daaaamn. Step up, step out. Could you ever dream something so sexy could be so comfortable to wear? The shimmer-soft satin fabric glides with your body, wraps around you with a glimpse of leg as you walk. 

 

It's so versatile - you can wear it to a cocktail party or just lounge around at home taking intimate questions from the paparazzi. Pair it with a thick silver cuff bracelet and accessories for a modern style, or sparkles for a special occasion. Wrap style dress with belt, floor length for total glamour. Solid color in midnight black.

 

Unless otherwise specified, length will be estimated floor length (if you prefer, add the desired length in the customization request box below - measure from top of shoulder down front over bust to desired length)

  • Semi-fitted silhouette
  • Flared skirt floor length (maxi)
  • Sleeveless, shawl collar
  • Tie belt in same material

 

Satin material: viscose 30%, elastane 5%, polyester 65%
